Source.Name: mkl-dnn
Source.Summary: Intel(R) Math Kernel Library for Deep Neural Networks (Intel(R) MKL-DNN)
Source.Description: Intel(R) Math Kernel Library for Deep Neural Networks (Intel(R) MKL-DNN) is an open source performance library for deep learning applications. The library accelerates deep learning applications and framework on Intel(R) architecture. Intel(R) MKL-DNN contains vectorized and threaded building blocks which you can use to implement deep neural networks (DNN) with C and C++ interfaces.
